word:
If she could ever have been that help to him she should have been, and reformed him, she would have saved her husband, and hers would have been a glorious reward; but she often had a set will of her own, a purpose to carry out of her own. She was not yielding, and pressed him often with her will and 


                                    -155- 

desire to do thus and so, when she might have yielded as well as not. She is not clear in the sight of heaven.
